assignments.label: Collect SLI, Audit Log, And Call Comment

assignments.name: Set_Work_Order_Amended_Charges_Indicator
assignments.label: Set Work Order Amended Charges Indicator

Flow.description: 09/30/2024: Save Reason for Decision values to SLIs 07/02/2024: v1 PR893288-5184

formulas.name: auditLogDetailsApproved
formulas.expression: 'Product Code: ' + {!Loop_SLIs_1.Product__r.Name} + ', Approval Status: Approved, Requested Unit: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_1.Requested_Unit__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_1.Requested_Unit__c})) + ', Unit: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_1.Unit__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_1.Unit__c})) + ', Requested Cost: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_1.Requested_Cost__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_1.Requested_Cost__c})) + ', Cost: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_1.Cost__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_1.Cost__c})) + ' User: ' + {!$User.Username} + ', Reason: ' + {!Reason_for_Decision}

formulas.name: auditLogDetailsPartialApproved
formulas.expression: 'Product Code: ' + {!Loop_SLIs_3.Product__r.Name} + ', Approval Status: Partially Approved, Requested Unit: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_3.Requested_Unit__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_3.Requested_Unit__c})) + ', Unit: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_3.Unit__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_3.Unit__c})) + ', Requested Cost: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_3.Requested_Cost__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_3.Requested_Cost__c})) + ', Cost: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_3.Cost__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_3.Cost__c})) + ' User: ' + {!$User.Username} + ', Reason: ' + {!Reason_for_Decision_Partial_Approve}

formulas.name: auditLogDetailsRejected
formulas.expression: 'Product Code: ' + {!Loop_SLIs_2.Product__r.Name} + ', Approval Status: Rejected, Requested Unit: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_2.Requested_Unit__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_2.Requested_Unit__c})) + ', Unit: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_2.Unit__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_2.Unit__c})) + ', Requested Cost: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_2.Requested_Cost__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_2.Requested_Cost__c})) + ', Cost: ' + IF(ISNULL({!Loop_SLIs_2.Cost__c}), 'None', TEXT({!Loop_SLIs_2.Cost__c})) + ' User: ' + {!$User.Username} + ', Reason: ' + {!Reason_for_Decision}

Flow.label: Approve Reject SLIs
